name: Animal Magic
summary: Your shapeshifting grants you a magical connection to the animal world.
description:
Your shapeshifting grants you a magical connection to the animal world. You can cast animal messenger, calm emotions (animals only), and speak with animals as 2nd-level primal innate spells once per day each. These spells use your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.Traits

Beastkin: Humanoids that can partially or fully transform into animal forms.
